author: The Hairy Bikers
programme: The Hairy Bikers: Mums Know Best
method: Blend all the ingredients except the oil in a food processor for 10-15 seconds, or until well combined. While the motor is running, pour the oil into the food processor very slowly until the well combined and the mixture is thick and glossy. Season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
ingredients: 2 free-range egg yolks,  1 free-range egg,  1 tbsp French mustard,  ½ lemon, juice only,  ½ tsp caster sugar,  400ml/14¼fl oz vegetable oil,  Salt and freshly ground black pepper
